title: Why do i get blocked in champ select for nothing?
body: I am never toxic in or out of games, i more often than not give up my called lane to keep people happy and heel the team non-toxic, so why do i get blocked from the chat in champ select? the chat bar goes red and the font changes and i cant type anything, which of course means you cant get the lane you want, i don't understand why this happens?

replies.body: i see a pattern of most people complaining saying they're not toxic lol
if you try to call before you have joined, or riot just wants to troll you, both valid reasons

It's usually there if you talk too much in quick succession.
It has nothing to do with your attitude, but it was made to shut spammers out to clear up the chat box until they were unblocked.

It shouldn't affect you unless you call your lane like 17 times without you noticing someone said it before you.

Or maybe you are joining very early and the block is there to sync you up at the same time with everyone else joining so no calls a lane before someone joins and starts a fight about it.
